text: uiloun jadeul-ege yagsogdoen cheon gug-eul biyuhasa geugos-e gangmul-i iss eudoe byeonhaji anihago uyuga heu leuneun gang-i iss-eudoe mas-i byeonhaji anihamyeo sul-i heuleuneun gang-i iss-eu ni masineun ideul-ege gippeum-eul jumyeo kkul-i heuleuneun gang-i iss-eudoe sunsuha go kkaekkeushadeola geugos-eneun ongaj gwa il-i iss-eumyeo junim-ui jabiga issno la ileohge saneun jadeul-i jiog-e sal myeo kkeulhneun mul-eul masyeo geudeul-ui naejang-i sansanjogag-i doeneun geudeulgwa gat-eul su issneunyo
